sentences.en: After studying differential calculus you will be able to solve these mathematical problems.
sentences.cn: 学了微积分之后,你们就能够解这些数学题了.

sentences.en: After their work, the calculus was no longer an appendage and extension of Greek geometry.
sentences.cn: 经过他们的工作, 微积分不再是古希腊几何的附庸和延展.

sentences.en: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .
sentences.cn: 综上所述就导出了微积分学中的最基本的定理。

sentences.en: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus.
sentences.cn: 综上所述就导出了微积分学中的最基本的定理.

sentences.en: As a result, the procedural cost - benefit calculus often becomes an exercise in poorly informed guesswork.
sentences.cn: 结果是, 程序性的 成本效益 计算常常成为缺少信息的推测.

sentences.en: Exploring Black Holes investigates these and many other questions using elementary calculus.
sentences.cn: 224探索黑洞会利用初等微积分研究这类问题.

sentences.en: How important do you think infinitesimal calculus is in life?
sentences.cn: 您觉得微积分在生活中有多重要?

sentences.en: I think I've finally unzipped this calculus problem.
sentences.cn: 我认为我最终解出了这道微积分题。

sentences.en: I'm specializing in differential and integral calculus.
sentences.cn: 我正专攻微分学和积分学.

sentences.en: I'm studying accounting principles, philosophy, calculus, English among others.
sentences.cn: 我学会计原理, 哲学, 微积分, 还有英语等其它课程.

sentences.en: My acquistion of calculus was a slow and painful process.
sentences.cn: 我掌握微积分的过程是缓慢而又痛苦的.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the effects of Jieshikang capsule on urinary calculus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究结石康抗尿路结石的作用.

sentences.en: Obstruction with stasis also led to the formation of the yellow-brown calculus (stone).
sentences.cn: 伴有尿液郁积的阻塞还能导致黄褐色的结石（石头）形成。

sentences.en: The foundations of partition calculus were laid down over twenty years ago by Erdos and Rado.
sentences.cn: 划分学的基础大约是在二十多年以前由Erdos和Rado奠定的.

sentences.en: They may have used pebbles to calculate, for the word " calculus " means " pebble ".
sentences.cn: 他们也许是用石子来作计算的, 因“calculus ” 这个字原意是 “ 石子 ”.

sentences.en: This is a problem where calculus won't help at all.
sentences.cn: 对于这一题,微积分一点也用不上.

sentences.en: We have to factor that into the calculus.
sentences.cn: 我们要在微积分学中考虑这些因素。

sentences.en: We only use the fundamental mathematics in the model, like calculus.
sentences.cn: 构建过程中仅用到了较基本的数学知识如:微积分的相关知识等.

sentences.en: We shall encounter some of his symbolism in our survey of the calculus.
sentences.cn: 以后在概述微积分发展时,我们将碰到他所创立的一些符号.

words.tran_cn: 结石的，结石症的；石一般的

phrases.tran_cn: 矢量微积分；矢算；向量计算；矢量计算

trans.tran_cn: [医]结石，石，积石，牙垢，[数]运算，演算，微积分（学）
trans.tran_en: the part of mathematics that deals with changing quantities, such as the speed of a falling stone or the slope of a curved line
